name: Thirst For Life
description:
Plot:
There was a local catastrophe in France and people began to turn into mutants for some unknown reason. But the military detected the appearance of a strange signal, it's where more mutants are coming from, then they sent a sweep squad and our main character is the leader of this squad. When the squad could land on the right place they fell into the trap, the mutants killed almost everyone except our hero who was able to escape, and now he is alone and tries to find and eliminate the source of all evil.

Features and game mechanics:
You have to run around the location and save yourself from the crowds of monsters as more enemies arrive. 2 time zones will tell you when you can safely move, replenishing stocks of cartridges, and when you need to wait for the hellish bloodbath.

The system of improving equipment gives you the opportunity to be tenacious, run faster, and most importantly, shoot more and more powerful!

A small element of horror will haunt you until the end of the game, and no one knows what can be next.

The game is divided into locations that will need to be passed, following the plot of the game, in the first version only 1 location will be available, their number will increase as the game updates. The second location is planned to be bigger, by area and by action, its release is planned for the first decade of 2019.

In the game there are 3 levels of difficulty, significantly affecting the permeability of certain situations. You better start from low complexity.
